comments.body: If the Jenkins node that you use has `jq` installed, this parsing can be largely simplified.
@wonderfly Agree. We could download it ourselves in this script, but that will introduce another dependency and make the code a little more complex. :)
If we are using `jq` we should download it as part of this test suite.
The `kubekins-test` image has `jq` preinstalled. I've been meaning to get the node e2e test running inside the `kubekins-test` image, but that hasn't happened yet.
@ixdy one of the purposes of node e2e is just to test different images with different os distros. :)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +2,6 @@GCI_IMAGE_FAMILY=gci-preview-test
GCI_IMAGE=$(gcloud compute images describe-from-family ${GCI_IMAGE_FAMILY} --project=${GCI_IMAGE_PROJECT} --format="value(name)")
DOCKER_VERSION=$(curl -fsSL --retry 3 https://api.github.com/repos/docker/docker/releases | tac | tac | grep -m 1 "\"tag_name\"\:" | grep -Eo "[0-9\.rc-]+")
GCI_CLOUD_INIT=test/e2e_node/jenkins/gci-init.yaml
